title: Directory Page Object
description: Directory page object contains paging information for related directory when directory result is paginated.

orderBy.title: Order by property
orderBy.description: The property by which this page is ordered.

start.title: First value
start.description: The first value, in sorted order, of the orderby property on this page.

next.title: Next page start value
next.description: The start value for the next page.

property.title: Filter properties
property.description: The list of properties by which the result is filtered, if any.

type.title: Filter type value
type.description: The applied type filtering value, if any.

count.title: Number of items
count.description: The number of items on this page.
